english.segment1: So after all, you needed more than a death-threat fall. You needed more, and I let you fall. Into the coffin with your floor-dropped jaw. And I remember you aspiration, your dream to fit in. But it's gone, and they're here. So let's kill these felons now.
english.segment2: But I remember you, you'll go, you'll find a way back home. But I remember you, when you stand there, You stand with your eyes closed.
english.segment3: And I feel, tonight, that I let you die. But you could have lived forever, it took smiles to keep you alive. But heroes die, and so did mine. But you go, and I stay, will it keep you at peace now.
english.segment4: But I remember you, you'll go, you'll find a way back home. But I remember you, when you stand there, You stand with your eyes closed.
english.segment5: And I'll dig you out, and I'll sit you up. For the fools to find you, the fools breathe into you.
english.segment6: So sleep child no one can touch you now. No one can hurt you now. Not here. Anymore.
